talk.author: did:plc:mx4nzus45ho7dciimoyozkjp
talk.utter:
March 2, 2020 when Pete Buttigieg and Amy Klobuchar endorsed Joe Biden seemed like a “party falling in line.”

Just an outsider’s perspective.

talk.author: did:plc:b7xlktj3m6zpkr2jdg572khk
talk.utter: I mean it's not "rigging" if two candidates see the writing on the wall and try to endorse the other candidate whose values they feel line up closest to their own

talk.author: did:plc:mx4nzus45ho7dciimoyozkjp
talk.utter:
True—the candidates with corporatist values endorsed a candidate whose values aligned with their own.

But, let’s not kid ourselves, their donors told them to fall in line.
